page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: There has been a{Christian}church in {Broadwell}since Saxon times. The Rector of{Broadwell}looks after the churches of{Broadwell, Adlestrop, {Oddington}and{Evenlode}with 1200 parishioners. He considers the needs of the congregations so that each village shares a variety of Sunday services and weekday meetings. He helps organise fetes and coffee mornings, inspects the churches with architects and builders, plans the weekly school assembly and answers many letters. He tries to visit each family, often taking communion to the housebound, also discussing baptisms, marriages and comforting the bereaved. Many helpers clean the churches, arrange the flowers, read Bible lessons, ring the bells and tidy churchyards so sharing the many activities of the Christian community.
